casebody.data:
PEOPLE
v.
ALFORD S243340 Supreme Court of California. JULY 25, 2018 Votes: Cantil-Sakauye, C.J., Chin, Corrigan, Liu, Cuéllar and Kruger, JJ.

The above-entitled matter is transferred to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Appellate District, Division One, with directions to vacate its decision and to reconsider the cause in light of **1132People v. Ruiz (2018) 4 Cal.5th 1100, 232 Cal.Rptr.3d 714, 417 P.3d 191. ( Cal. Rules of Court, rule 8.528(d).)
